required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Effects of Low Level Laser Therapy in the Physical Training and the Muscle Responses in Humans.
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1. Muscle Genic Expression Under Strength Training and Photostimulated by Laser.

brief_summary.textblock:
The hypothesis of this study is that a chronic program of physical strength
training, associates to effects of low level laser therapy (LLLT) can,
possibly, provide changes in genic expression of muscle and to promote an
enhancement of anaerobic muscle performance in humans.

clinical_study.condition: Joint, Bone and Muscles of Lower Limbs Free of Any Disease

arm_group.arm_group_label: LLLT and Physical Strength training in Humans

intervention.intervention_name: Photon stimulation by low level laser therapy
intervention.arm_group_label: LLLT and Physical Strength training in Humans

Epub 2008 Dec 5.

Photomed Laser Surg. 2009 Aug;27(4):617-23. doi: 10.1089/pho.2008.2350.
